content.text: Hello there, my name is Michelle.
It's nice to meet you, Michelle. What do you do for fun?
I like to fly kites and play music on my days off. How about you?
I like to fish and craft clothing in my spare time.
That's really cool! I wish I could sew.
It's not too hard to learn. You could start by making some simple bags or clothes.
That's a good idea. I've always wanted to learn how to make my own clothes.
You should definitely give it a try. It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself.
I think I will. Thanks for the advice, John.
No problem, Michelle. I'm always happy to help.
